Tag Archives: Zak Penn

Review – Ready Player One

The new film by director Steven Spielberg, is based on the novel of the same name by Ernest Cline – Ready Player One. Cline additionally co-wrote the screenplay with Zak Penn. Set in a dystopian future, specifically 2045, where ‘post the corn syrup drought, and the bandwidth riots’ the world has taken to ‘living with problems rather than trying to

Review – X-Men : The Last Stand

To the third film in the X-Men series – X-Men : The Last Stand. Following the huge success of X2, Bryan Singer opted to leave the franchise, in order to take on the challenge of Superman Returns rather than the third film in the franchise. Leaving only a partly formed notion for the 3rd film, Singer handed over the reigns to director

Review – Avengers Assemble

Well here it is – The end of the MCU Phase 1 and the location to which so many of these roads have been heading – Avengers Assemble. The 5 prior films in so far in the MCU all have some bearing on the evolution of this film, from the most obvious set up in Iron Man 2, through to
